pages.text: The $(item)Sculk Emitter$() is one of the key parts required for a sculk transporting system. It automatically takes items from the container beneath, converts them into a sculk signal and sends them to any nearby $(l:sculktransporting:sculk_transmitter)$(item)Sculk Transmitters$() or $(l:sculktransporting:sculk_receiver)$(item)Receivers$().

pages.title: Crafting:
pages.text: The $(item)Sculk Emitter$() can be modified with $(l:sculktransporting:quantity_modifiers)$(item)Quantity Modifiers$() or $(l:sculktransporting:speed_modifiers)$(item)Speed Modifiers$(). By default, it is able to pick up and store $(thing)1 item$() every $(thing)$(t:20 ticks)1 second$().
